page.title: 18DAIRY FARMING AT PARKNOWE P2
page.content: My dad normally takes about 4 to 6 cows to a show. At the shows my dad has won so far about 86 rosettes and 53 certificates all for showing. On our farm apart from cows he has two horses , five dogs and some chickens. My dad has three farm workers to help on the farm.Two of them live in cottages and one lives in a caravan.On his farm he has 4 tractors,4 trailers, a 3 furrows reversible plough,1 mower condiconer, 1 square baler, 1 round baler, 1 hay tedder , 2 combine harvesters, 1 3-ton roller, 1 gang roller ,1 set harrows,1 slurry tanker, 1 seed (grain), 1 cattle float, 1 feed wagon, 1 fertiliser spreader.
